mapper.select: SELECT lb.ucode ucode, b.bcontent bcontent, b.blikecount blikecount, ui.uatid uatid, ui.unickname unickname, ui.uimage uimage, b.ucode ucode, b.bcode bcode, b.battach battach, b.bbcode, b.btype, lb.ltype ltype, lb.bbtype bbtype, lb.ldate ldate, lb.bdate bdate, b.breplycount breplycount, b.bquotecount bquotecount, -- 원글(105번글) bbcode(100번글)의 작성자 정보 NVL2(b.bbcode, get_user_info(1,b.ucode), '없음') uimage, NVL2(b.bbcode, get_user_info(2,b.ucode), '없음') unickname, NVL2(b.bbcode, get_user_info(3,b.ucode), '없음') uatid, b.bregdate FROM user_info ui, like_bookmark lb, board b WHERE lb.ucode = #{ucode} AND lb.bbtype = 1 AND lb.bcode = b.bcode AND b.ucode = ui.ucode order by lb.bdate desc
mapper.delete: delete from like_bookmark where ucode = #{ucode} and ltype = 0
mapper.select: select b.bcode, b.bcontent, b.battach, u.unickname, u.uatid, u.uimage,b.bregdate from board b, user_info u where b.bcode = #{bbcode} and b.ucode = u.ucode
